channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee -- Data Loss Prevention
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee -- Data Loss Prevention

item.title: CVE-2019-3640|2024-08-04T19:12:09.699Z -- mcafee -- data%20loss%20prevention
item.description: Unprotected Transport of Credentials in ePO extension in McAfee Data Loss Prevention 11.x prior to 11.4.0 allows remote attackers with access to the network to collect login details to the LDAP server via the ePO extension not using a secure connection when testing LDAP connectivity.
